CustomField.description: If this Contact was referred by another Contact, use this field to link to that Contact's record; if not, enter the name in the "Referred by Non-Contact" field
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this Contact was referred by a person other than a Contact in Salesforce, enter the name in this field. If the referring person has a Contact record in Salesforce, please use the "Referred by Contact" field to link to that Contact record.
CustomField.label: Referred by Non-Contact
